description:
For the past 10-odd years, futsal has been booming across the world. After watching Tokinari Tennoji represent Japan in the U-18 World Cup, Haru Yamato aspires to be a player like him. He joins the Koyo Gakuen Futsal Club where he meets teammates Seiichiro Sakaki, a loner who refuses to pass the ball to anyone, and Toi Tsukioka, who is burdened by a past that nearly made him quit futsal for good.

(Source: Funimation)

tags.name: Football
tags.description: Centers around the sport of football (known in the USA as "soccer").

tags.name: School Club
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a school club scene.

tags.name: Primarily Male Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of male characters.

tags.name: Super Power
tags.description: Prominently features characters with special abilities that allow them to do what would normally be physically or logically impossible.

tags.name: Cute Boys Doing Cute Things
tags.description: Centers around male characters doing cute activities, usually with little to no emphasis on drama and conflict.

tags.name: Delinquents
tags.description: Features characters with a notorious image and attitude, sometimes referred to as "yankees".

tags.name: Boys' Love
tags.description: Prominently features romance between two males, not inherently sexual.

title.native: Futsal Boys!!!!! ショートアニメ

node.description:
__Circle:__  Ogeretsu

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/tanaca_) | [Twitter 2](https://twitter.com/chamisuru_o) | [Official Website](http://ogetana.sakura.ne.jp/) | [Pixiv 1](https://www.pixiv.net/users/4534443) | [Pixiv 2](https://www.pixiv.net/users/100086893)

Uses Tanaka Marumero as a pen-name for non-BL works.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/hoshino_lily)

Lily Hoshino, alternatively named Ririi Hoshino, is a Japanese mangaka, doujin artist, illustrator and character designer known for her extremely cute art style featured in her many published manga, some of which are shounen-ai. She also does illustrations for yuri magazines.

On January 25, 2016, Lily announced that she had gotten married, while later in March 2019, she gave birth to a baby boy.

__[Profile (Verygoo)](http://www.verygoo.jp/artists/ron/)__ | __[Twitter](https://twitter.com/ron_sdf)__

__Ryuuta Iida__, also known by his stage name Ron (stylized as R・O・N) is a Japanese musician, arranger, composer, lyricist, sound producer, guitarist, keyboardist and singer. He was the sound producer and guitarist of Japanese rock band [OLDCODEX](https://anilist.co/staff/112151/OLDCODEX) along with seiyuu [Tatsuhisa Suzuki](https://anilist.co/staff/95735) from 2009-2012.

He currently works under the artist management company Verygoo, has a solo vocal project called [Stereo Dive Foundation](https://anilist.co/staff/118710/Stereo-Dive-Foundation), is a member of the rock band [ROSARYHILL](http://rosaryhill.net/) (2008-) as a keyboardist and vocalist, and works as a music creator for the creative music unit [(K)NoW_NAME](https://anilist.co/staff/126602/KNoW-NAME).
_Note: Not to be confused with the [animator](https://anilist.co/staff/254528/)._

__[Profile (Lantis)](http://www.lantis.jp/artist/stereodivefoundation/bio.html)__ | __[Twitter](https://twitter.com/ron_sdf)__

__Stereo Dive Foundation__ is the solo sound making project of Japanese musician [Ryuuta Iida](https://anilist.co/staff/106037), otherwise known as Ron (stylized as R・O・N)
